profile.name: David Heffler
profile.title: Software Engineer | Mathematics & CS Student @ MSJC

about: I'm a self-taught full-stack software engineer with 7+ years of experience, currently balancing coding with full-time studies. I build production systems end-to-end, with TypeScript/React frontends, robust APIs, CI/CD, and pragmatic infrastructure. Outside of tech, I enjoy photography, hiking, chess, Tetris, rhythm games, and maintaining a cacti garden.

experience.title: Founder & Technical Consultant
experience.description: Founded a consultancy delivering full-stack, production-grade systems for international clients with fast iterations and reliable operations.
bullets: Architected and shipped e-commerce and B2C platforms using TypeScript, Next.js, and MongoDB/PostgreSQL.
Implemented CI/CD with Docker and Coolify; standardized deploy workflows, rollbacks, and environment parity.
Established operational readiness: uptime monitoring, structured logs, backups, SSL/TLS, and CDN caching.
Partnered directly with stakeholders to scope clear milestones and deliver on aggressive timelines.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer
experience.description: Contributed to an External Attack Surface Management (EASM) platform focused on scalable OSINT and security intelligence.
bullets: Engineered 20+ OSINT collectors with resilient scheduling, backoff, and fault-tolerance.
Designed microservice APIs and message-driven data pipelines; improved data integrity and throughput.
Reduced ingestion latency and improved observability with structured logs and metrics.
Collaborated on data modeling and storage strategies balancing cost, speed, and retention requirements.
